## registry.getAllItems() function

Returns a map of items registered with the given type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getAllItems<T>(type: string | Type<T>, opt_cased?: boolean, opt_throwIfMissing?: boolean): {
    [key: string]: T | null | (new (...p1: any[]) => T);
} | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string \| [Type](./blockly.registry_namespace.type_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The type of the plugin. (e.g. Category) |
|  opt\_cased | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether or not to return a map with cased keys (rather than caseless keys). False by default. |
|  opt\_throwIfMissing | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether or not to throw an error if we are unable to find the object. False by default. |

**Returns:**

{ \[key: string\]: T \| null \| (new (...p1: any\[\]) =&gt; T); } \| null

A map of objects with the given type, or null if none exists.
